## Description

This is a demo of a marketplace fullstack application.

## Installation

1- Go to the backend folder and run:

```bash
$ yarn install
```

2- Go to the frontend folded and run:

```bash
$ yarn install
```

## Running the app

1- Go to the backend folder and run:

```bash
$ yarn dev
```

2- Go to the frontend folder and run:

```bash
$ yarn dev
```
